title: Covid: People urged to socialise carefully as cases hit new record
content:
1. Covid: People urged to socialise carefully as cases hit new record  BBC News
  2. Covid: people should cut down on socialising during Omicron surge, warns Chris Whitty  Guardian News
  3. Scale back Christmas plans, England's chief medical officer warns public  Reuters UK
  4. Chris Whitty sends clear message on festive parties as Omicron surges  BBC News
  5. Cut back on socialising, says Whitty, as he predicts surge of hospitalisations  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コビット：患者数が過去最高を記録したため、人付き合いに注意するよう促される
